maqras.text: 7|88|geuui baegseong jung-e omanhan jadeul-ui udumeolideul-i malhadeola syuaibeuyeo ulineun geudaewa geuligo geudae wa hamkke mid-eum-eul gajin geudeul-eul uliui go-eul-eseo chubanghalila anilamyeongeudaedeul-i uliui jong-gyolo dol-aolahani syuaibeuga ileudeola ulineungeugeos-eul jung-oham-ila

7|89|hananim-i ulileul guhasa u liga neohui jong-gyolo dol-agandamyeon sil lo ulineun hananimkke geojishage doem ila hananim-i wonhaji anihasi ni uliga geugeos-eulo dol-agam-i hab dangchi anh-eum-ila junim-eun modeun geos-eul geubun-ui jihyean-e dusyeoss-euni juyeo jeohuineun hananimkke uijonhanaida jinlilosseo jeohuiwa i baegseongdeul-eul simpan hayeo jusoseo dangsin-iya mallo gajang hullyunghan simpanja isibnida
7|90|geuui baegseongjung-e midji anihan jadeul-ui udumeolideul-i malhadeola neohuideul-i syuaibeuleul ttaleundamyeon neohuideul-eun bunmyeonghi myeolmanghalila
7|91|geuttae ttang-i jindonghamyeogeudeul-eul deopchini geudeul-eun sichega doeeo neom-eo jideola
7|92|ileohdeus syuwaibeuleul geoyeoghan jadeul-eun geudeul-i salji anihaessdeon geos cheoleom myeolmanghaess-euni sillo syuaibeuleul geoyeoghan jadeul-i sonsiljadeul-ila

7|93|geulihayeo syuaibeuneun geudeul-eultteonamyeonseo baegseongdeul-iyeo sillo naega junim-i bonaen mesejileul imi neohui ege jeonhayeossgo neohuiege chung-gohayeoss eum-ila geuleohamae naega eojji mid-eum eul geoyeoghaneun baegseongdeul-eul bogo seulpeo haliyo
7|94|hananim-i go-eul-e yeeonjaleul bonaess-eul ttae geuui baegseongdeullo hayeogeum gonangwa yeoggyeong-eul masbodolog haess-euni ineun geudeul-i gyeomsonham-eul baeudolog haessnola

7|95|geuleon hu hananim-i geunal-ui go nan-eul geodugo beon-yeonghage hani geudeul eun beonseonghayeo malhagil uliui seonjo deuldo machangajilo gonan-eul danghayeoss-euna pung-yolowossseubnida hadeola icheo leom geudeul-i alji moshamae hananim-eun geudeul-eul gabjagi as-a gassnola

7|96|geu go-eul-ui baegseongdeul-i mid-eum-eul gajgo hananim-eul gong-gyeonghayeossdamyeon ha nanim-eun geudeul-eul wihae haneulgwa ttang-eu lobuteo chugbog-eul yeol-eo jueoss-eulila geuleona geudeul-eun jinlileul geoyeoghaess-eunihananim-eun geudeul-i eod-eun geos-eulo mal miam-a geudeul-eul as-a gassnola
7|97|go-eul-ui baegseongdeul-i jamdeuneun bam e hananim-ui beol-i geudeul-ege ileul ttae geudeul-i anjeonhadeonyo
7|98|heug-eun olag-eul jeulgineun balg-eun naj-e geudeul-ege dolaehal hananim-ui beol e daehayeo geu go-eul baegseongdeul-eun anjeonhadeonyo
7|99|geudeul-eun hananim-ui gyehoeg-e dae hayeo ansimhaneunyo eoneu nugudo ha nanim-ui gyehoeg-e daehayeo ansimhaji anihana myeolmanghan baegseongdeul-eun geuleohjianihayeossdeola

7|100|seonjodeul-eul gyeseungbad-a daejileul mullyeo bad-eun ideul-ege geugeos-eun hana ui gyohun-i anideonyo hananim-i won hasa geudeul-i joejieul ttae hananim-eun geudeul-eul myeolmangke hago ma-eum-eul bongha ni geudeul-eun deudji moshadeola

7|101|hananim-i geudaeege geu go eul-e gwanhae iyagi halila sillo seonjijadeul-i aejeung-eul gajigo geudeul-e ge dolaehayeoss-euna ijeon-e geoyeoghayeoss deus-i geudeul-eun midji anihayeoss-eumae hananim-eun mid-eum-eul geoyeoghan ideul-ui ma-eum-eul bonghasyeossdeola
7|102|hananim-eun geudeul daedasuga geudeul-ui seong-yag-e jinsildoeji moshago geu deul daedasuga geoyeogham-eul al-assdeola

7|103|geulihayeo hananim-eun hue moseleul tonghayeo palaowa geuui udumeolideul-ege hananim-ui yejungdeul eul bonaess-euna geudeul-eun geugeos-eul geoyeog hayeoss-euni bola aghanjadeul-ui malloga eotteohadeonyo
7|104|ittae mosega ileugil palaoyeo naega man-yuui junim-i bonaen seon jijala
7|105|naneun hananim-e gwanhayeo jin lioeeneun yaegihal gwonliga eobs-eumyeo naega junim-ui malsseum-eul gajigo neohui ege wass-euni iseula-el jasondeulgwa hamkke gadolog hayeo jusoseo lago yo guhani
7|106|palaoga daedabhagil geudae ga jinsil-ilamyeon gajyeoon yejeung-eul bo ila hadeola
7|107|ittae mosega geuui jipang-ileuldeonjini bola geugeos-eun bunmyeonghan baem-i doeeossdeola
7|108|tto mosega geuui son-eul kkeonae ni bola geugeos-eun modeun gugyeongkkundeul-e ge hayahge doeeossdeola
7|109|ittae palao baegseongdeul-ui udumeolideul-i malhagil ineun suglyeondoen ma sulsala
7|110|geuga neohuiui ttang-eseo neohui deul-eul chubanghalyeo uidohani neohuideul eun eotteohge haess-eumyeon johgessneunyo
7|111|geudeul-i malhagil geuwa geuligogeuui hyeongjeleul jamsi bolyuhala geuli go salam-eul gag dosilo bonaeeo
7|112|suglyeondoen uliui modeun masulsadeul-eul geudaeege oge haliyo
7|113|geulihayeo masulsadeul-i pala o-egelo wa malhagil mullon jeohuiga sunglihandamyeon geue sang-eunghan bosang-eul badge doegessjiyo lago malhani
7|114|geuga malhagil geu isang-ila ttohan jigchaeg-i ollaga nae yeop-e issge doelila hani
7|115|geudeul-i malhagil moseyeo geu daega meonjeo deonjil geos-inyo animyeon u liga meonjeo deonjil geos-inyo lago malha ni
7|116|mosega illeo galodoe neohuiga meonjeo deonjila hani geudeul-i meonjeo deon jyeo baegseongdeul-ui nun-eul yuhoghago geudeul eul dulyeoum-eulo gadeugchage haneun ma sul-eul boyeossdeola
